summary: This is an email chain from May 29, 2020, discussing the Netflix documentary about Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondents mention the renewed public interest and pressure due to the documentary's release, and note that COVID-19 has delayed investigative decisions regarding other individuals involved.

events.title: Release of Netflix Epstein Documentary
events.description: A new Netflix documentary series about Jeffrey Epstein is released, generating renewed public interest and pressure on investigators.

keyFacts: The email chain discusses a new Netflix documentary about Jeffrey Epstein released around May 2020.
The correspondents note the documentary has created a 'buzz in the air' and renewed energy and pressure on investigators.
COVID-19 is cited as preventing decisions or actions regarding 'other folks' (likely other subjects of investigation) from moving forward in the next month or two.
The subjects of investigation are described as 'not being ongoing threats to public safety'.
One correspondent finds the documentary's pacing 'a little tedious' and suggests it was made longer than necessary.
